name: Rehabilitation of motor deficits and restoration of functional networks after mild Traumatic Brain Injury (mTBI) by transcranial Direct Current Stimulation (tDCS)
description:
The cross-linking project X01 focuses on the rehabilitation of motor deficits and restoration of functional networks after mild Traumatic Brain Injury (mTBI) by transcranial Direct Current Stimulation (tDCS).
This project represents the cooperation between the Institute for Cognitive Neuroscience and the Institute for Biological Information Processing of the Research Centre Juelich in close connection with the Department of Neurology, University Hospital Cologne. Further, the cooperation with the Concussion Centre Rhineland links all research areas of humans and animals of the CRC.
